Name: Validation - PE
Text: In pm4py, a StrictPartialOrder is a single node in a higher level PO. Its children are internal. It executes them. When final_process finishes executing QA and SA, the higher level node final_process is finished (conceptually). Then GLA can start. So final_process -> GLA is correct.
